channel.title: Subhrajyoty Roy on StatWizard
channel.description: Recent content in Subhrajyoty Roy on StatWizard

item.title: callgrind-reader - Typescript Package
item.description: An npm package written in typescript to parse callgrind like files and extract profiling metrics from code

item.title: Pwdmgr
item.description: An open source python application for lightweight password management system through console.

item.title: Rough-Fuzzy CPD: a gradual change point detection algorithm
item.description: This article proposes a methodology to incorporate rough-fuzzy set theory into the changepoint detection algorithms to enable them more befitting towards gradual changepoint detection.

item.title: A generalized epidemiological model with dynamic and asymptomatic population
item.description: This article proposes a new epidemiological model SINTRUE to model the dynamics of a contaminating disease with a significant asymptomatic population. As an working example, we use the Covid-19 data of Chattisgarh to model and predict the second wave of covid.

item.title: rsvddpd - R package
item.description: An R package to perform robust singular value decomposition using minimum density power divergence estimator

item.title: A New Robust Scalable Singular Value Decomposition Algorithm for Video Surveillance Background Modelling
item.description: Classical singular value decomposition suffers from presence of outliers in the data. In this article, we present the estimation of singular values through density power divergence which is robust and efficient.

item.title: Trustworthy Dimensionality Reduction
item.description: My master’s dissertation about creating a new dimensionality reduction technique which is trustworthy.

item.title: Texture Networks
item.description: In this post, I analyse Texture Network, a special type of neural network to synthesize textures and performing Neural Style Transfer, the art of mixing the content of a picture with the style from another picture.

item.title: Analysis of Pollution Patterns in Regions of Kolkata
item.description: This article analyzes the pollution patterns of Kolkata based on an extensive historical data of more than 15 years. The analysis focus on interpreting general patterns present in pollution and a prediction methodology, which may be used to calibrate low-cost pollution monitoring sensors.

item.title: roufcp - Python package
item.description: A python package to perform gradual changepoint detection in a time series data using Rough-Fuzzy set theory

item.title: COVID 19 Tracker
item.description: A Dashboard for Prediction and Control assistance and management of resources in view of Covid-19 pandemic, sponsored by IIM, Vishakhapatnam

item.title: The Information Content of Taster's Valuation in Tea Auctions of India
item.description: Tea auctions across India occur as an ascending open auction, conducted online. Before the auction, a sample of the tea lot is sent to potential bidders and a group of tea tasters. The seller’s reserve price is a confidential function of the tea taster’s valuation, which also possibly acts as a signal to the bidders.

item.title: Analysis of basic Epidemiological models - Part 2
item.description: In this post, we describe a slight generalization of the basic SIR model of epidemiology and its estimation procedure under both frequentist and Bayesian paradigms. We also make projections of the covid cases over next several days based on the fitted model.

item.title: Analysis of basic Epidemiological models - Part 1
item.description: In this post, we describe a basic statistical model of epidemiology, named SIR model and its estimation procedure under both frequentist and Bayesian paradigms.

item.title: Chatbot with Seq2Seq model
item.description: A simple Chatbot with Seq2Seq model with Bahadau Attention Mechanism trained on Cornell Movie Corpus dataset.

item.title: Causal Inference using DAG Models
item.description: Introduction to Causal Analysis using Directed Acylic Graphs (DAG)

item.title: D. Basu Gold Medal Award Presentation on tSNE
item.description: This is a talk I gave during the D. Basu Gold Medal Award Ceremony in Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata.

item.title: Feasibility of Transparent Price Discovery in Tea through Auction in India
item.description: This article examines Tea Auctions in India and forms an idea about the valuations that occur for several of the tea grades, and endeavoured to fit the model determining the final transaction price of the auction based on several relevant factors. The article also looks into the significance of manual valuations as predictors for the final price, and discussed several aspects to do away with the practice of manual valuations.

item.title: Onset detection - A new approach to QBH system
item.description: We develop a QBH system based on detection of onsets of a song, within a statistical framework.

item.title: A simple Text Prediction Application
item.description: A simple text prediction application built for Data Science Specialization in Coursera.
